requirements.description: The system must modernize the management and delivery of products through automatic vending machines.
requirements.source_text: Il progetto, JavaBrew nasce dall’esigenza di modernizzare la gestione e l’erogazione di prodotti attraverso i distributori automatici per snack e bevande.

requirements.description: The system must create an integrated and secure platform to fully support end-users, operators, and system administrators.
requirements.source_text: L’obiettivo principale è creare una piattaforma integrata, semplice e sicura, che supporti in modo completo l’utente finale quanto gli operatori e gli amministratori del sistema.
requirements.quality_notes: Needs Detail – specify what aspects of integration and security are required.

requirements.description: The system must enable users to purchase items by scanning a unique QR code displayed on the machine using a mobile application.
requirements.source_text: Grazie all’applicazione mobile e a un wallet digitale associato all’account personale, l’utente può acquistare articoli inquadrando con lo smartphone il codice QR univoco visualizzato sulla macchina.

requirements.description: The system must offer a dashboard that displays statistics on sales and malfunctions.
requirements.source_text: Il gestionale della piattaforma offre una dashboard che mostra statistiche sulle vendite e sui malfunzionamenti.

requirements.description: The system must allow administrators to monitor sales, stock levels, and efficiently plan maintenance and replenishment activities.
requirements.source_text: permettendo agli amministratori di monitorare vendite, scorte e pianificare in modo efficiente le attività di manutenzione e rifornimento.

requirements.description: The system must improve the user experience.
requirements.source_text: migliorare l’esperienza d’uso degli utenti.
requirements.quality_notes: Vague/Unquantified – specify what metrics will define an improved experience.

requirements.description: The system must reduce response times for operators.
requirements.source_text: ridurre i tempi di intervento per gli operatori.
requirements.quality_notes: Needs Detail – specify expected response time metrics.

requirements.description: The system must provide a scalable service that aligns with modern technologies.
requirements.source_text: tramite un servizio scalabile e in linea con le tecnologie moderne.

requirements.description: The system must track inventory in real-time.
requirements.source_text: Non tengono traccia in tempo reale delle scorte.

requirements.description: The system must support digital payment methods.
requirements.source_text: Offrono pagamenti solo in contanti o chiavette prepagate (metodi di pagamento datati).

requirements.description: The system must provide centralized tools for management and maintenance.
requirements.source_text: Non dispongono di strumenti centralizzati per la gestione e la manutenzione.

requirements.description: The system must integrate digital payments and remote monitoring.
requirements.source_text: JavaBrew intende risolvere queste lacune, offrendo una piattaforma che unisce pagamenti digi- tali e monitoraggio remoto.
requirements.quality_notes: Needs Detail – specify what types of digital payments are supported.

requirements.description: The system must allow users to register or log in to view the wallet balance and transaction history.
requirements.source_text: L’utente può registrarsi o accedere con il proprio account per visualizzare il saldo del wallet (borsellino digitale) e lo storico delle transazioni.

requirements.description: The system must allow users to recharge their account using cash through a machine or other online payment methods.
requirements.source_text: Può ricaricare il conto in contanti recandosi presso una macchinetta oppure tramite altri metodi di pagamento online.

requirements.description: The system must automatically deduct the purchase amount from the user's digital wallet when a product is selected.
requirements.source_text: il saldo verrà scalato automaticamente dal wallet digitale.

requirements.description: The system must provide the platform administrator with configuration capabilities for the vending machines, price management, sales reporting, and general statistics.
requirements.source_text: L’amministratore della piattaforma è responsabile della configurazione delle macchine, della gestione dei prezzi, dei report di vendita e delle statistiche generali.

requirements.description: The system must allow the administrator access to CRUD functionality for all users, specific vending machines, and items.
requirements.source_text: Ha accesso a funzionalità CRUD per tutti gli utenti (in particolare i manutentori), per i singoli distributori e gli articoli.

requirements.description: The system must generate automatic reports for maintenance workers regarding insufficient supplies or malfunctioning vending machines.
requirements.source_text: È guidato da report automatici generati dall’autodiagnosi dei distributori che segnalano scorte insufficienti o malfunzionamenti.

requirements.description: The system must be able to detect vending machines that are not connected to the Internet.
requirements.source_text: implementando un meccani-smo di rilevamento dei distributori non connessi (ad esempio tramite polling)

requirements.description: The system must maintain an offline register to locally track transactions during periods of disconnection.
requirements.source_text: introducendo un offline register per tracciare localmente le transazioni avvenute durante il periodo di disconnessione

requirements.description: The system must synchronize local transactions with the central database once the Internet connection is restored.
requirements.source_text: Una volta ristabilita la connessione, tali transazioni verrebbero sincronizzate e inserite nel database centrale.

requirements.description: The system must allow anonymous users to complete transactions using cash only.
requirements.source_text: permettendo a utenti non registrati (anonymous users) di effettuare transazioni solamente in contante

requirements.description: The system must supply the necessary infrastructure, including modems and servers, for its operation.
requirements.source_text: L’installazione di modem e server comporta un investimento iniziale considerevole
requirements.quality_notes: Needs Detail – specify the infrastructure requirements.

requirements.description: The system must authenticate the user to provide access to the personalized interface.
requirements.source_text: Lo user è autenticato e ha accesso all’interfaccia personalizzata del sistema.

requirements.description: The system must verify user credentials during the login process.
requirements.source_text: Il sistema verifica le credenziali.

requirements.description: The system must display an error message if the user enters incorrect credentials.
requirements.source_text: Credenziali errate: messaggio di errore che invita a riprovare.

requirements.description: The system must allow the user to register a new account by entering their first name, last name, email, and password.
requirements.source_text: 2. Inserisce nome, cognome, email e password.

requirements.description: The system must validate the entered fields during user registration.
requirements.source_text: 3. Il sistema valida i campi inseriti.

requirements.description: The system must allow an admin to create a new vending machine.
requirements.source_text: Il sistema contiene una nuova vending machine che appare nelle analytics.

requirements.description: The system must store the new vending machine information in the database.
requirements.source_text: Il sistema salva la vending machine nel database.

requirements.description: The system must verify the data provided for creating the vending machine.
requirements.source_text: Il sistema verifica i dati.

requirements.description: The system must display error messages and request retry if there is an error during saving.
requirements.source_text: 4.1 Errore nel salvataggio: messaggio e richiesta di riprovare.

requirements.description: The system must support communication between clients and machines.
requirements.source_text: Supporta la comunicazione tra clienti e macchine:

requirements.description: The system must track the active connections between users and machines, including user_id, machine_id, and the start time of the connection.
requirements.source_text: • connection: Traccia le connessioni attive tra utenti e macchina (es. user_id, machine_id, start istante in cui inizia la connessione).

requirements.description: The system must establish connections specifically between a user and a concrete vending machine.
requirements.source_text: La connessione avviene tra un user e una concrete vending machine (invece che tra un customer e una vending machine).

requirements.description: The system must allow for future development of features such as remote maintenance by technicians or administrators.
requirements.source_text: in modo da rendere possibile in un futuro sviluppo dell’applicazione la gestione di feature come manutenzione remota (es. sblocco di un prodotto rimasto bloccato) da parte del tecnico o dell’admin.
requirements.quality_notes: Needs Detail – specify what features will be included in the future.

tests.description_summary: Verifies the ability to use H2 in-memory database for rapid testing.
Validates the compliance of persistence management with JPA standards.
Checks the generation of database schema from object model using Hibernate.
Ensures proper handling of distributed transactions through the Jakarta Transaction API.
Verifies the functionality of the unit testing framework.
Validates the mocking capabilities for simulating dependencies.
Checks the effectiveness of code coverage generation reports.
Verifies the integration of various components to ensure the overall use case works as expected.
Tests to ensure that the application meets the requirements of the identified use cases.
Verifies that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials.

tests.description_summary: Tests that an error message is displayed when the user enters incorrect credentials.

tests.coverage_hint: User Login failure due to system error
tests.description_summary: Verifies that an appropriate error message is presented to the user when a system error occurs during login.
Verifies the successful registration of a user and access to a personalized interface.
Tests that the system displays an error message when the input fields are incorrect or empty.
Verifies that an appropriate error message is shown when there is an authentication issue during registration.
Verifies that a customer can successfully buy an item and update their balance.
Tests that an error is triggered when the customer has insufficient funds.

tests.coverage_hint: Out of stock product error handling
tests.description_summary: Verifies that an error occurs if the selected product is out of stock.
Verifies that the customer can successfully connect to the vending machine after scanning the QR code.

tests.coverage_hint: Vending machine already connected error handling

tests.coverage_hint: Vending machine out of service error handling
tests.description_summary: Verifies that an error is shown when the vending machine is out of use.
Verifies that the customer can successfully recharge their balance and see the updated amount.
Tests the scenario where a payment fails during the recharge process.
Verifies that a task marked as completed no longer appears in the user's task list.
Tests that an error message is returned when there is an error in saving the task.

tests.coverage_hint: Admin views user and item analytics
tests.description_summary: Verifies that the admin can access and view analytics data successfully.
Tests that the task assignment functionality correctly includes views of workers and tasks.
Verifies the correct handling of create/read/update/delete operations for workers.
Verifies the correct handling of create/read/update/delete operations for users.
Verifies the correct handling of create/read/update/delete operations for items.

tests.coverage_hint: CRUD operations for managing vending machines
tests.description_summary: Verifies the correct handling of create/read/update/delete operations for vending machines.

Tests that an error message is returned when required fields are missing or incorrect during the vending machine creation.
Verifies that the newly created vending machine is saved in the database and appears in analytics.

tests.coverage_hint: Vending Machine database saving error handling
tests.description_summary: Tests that an error message and prompt to retry are presented when there is a saving error during the vending machine creation.

use_case.name: User Product Purchase
main_flow: User scans the unique QR code displayed on the vending machine.
User selects the item they wish to purchase.
User completes the payment via the associated digital wallet.

use_case.name: Admin Dashboard Monitoring
main_flow: Admin views statistics on sales and malfunctions.
Admin monitors stock levels and sales performance.
Admin plans maintenance and restocking activities efficiently.

use_case.name: User Registration and Login
main_flow: User registers or logs in to view wallet balance and transaction history

use_case.name: Wallet Recharge
main_flow: User recharges wallet in cash at machine or online payment methods

use_case.name: CRUD Operations for Users and Distributors
main_flow: Admin performs CRUD operations for users

use_case.name: Vending Machine Maintenance
main_flow: Worker maintains and replenishes vending machines based on automatic reports

use_case.name: User Login
main_flow: Lo user apre la pagina di login (Fig. 6).
Inserisce la propria mail e password e clicca il tasto Login.
Il sistema fornisce accesso all’interfaccia personalizzata.
alternative_flows: Credenziali errate: messaggio di errore che invita a riprovare.
Errore di sistema: messaggio di errore che invita a riprovare più tardi.

use_case.name: Buy Item
main_flow: Il customer si trova nell’interfaccia del catalogo prodotti (Fig. 10).
Il sistema controlla saldo e disponibilità.
Il sistema scala il saldo ed eroga il prodotto.

use_case.name: Recharge Balance
main_flow: Il customer si trova nella propria pagina personale (Fig. 9a).
Sceglie metodo di pagamento e importo.
Il sistema verifica e processa la transazione.

use_case.name: View task details
main_flow: Worker views the details of a task.

use_case.name: Mark task as completed
main_flow: Worker marks the task as completed after viewing details.

use_case.name: Mark task as completed
main_flow: Il sistema registra la task nei log.
alternative_flows: Errore nel salvataggio: messaggio di errore.

use_case.name: View Analytics
alternative_flows: Errore di caricamento: messaggio di errore.

use_case.name: Create New Vending Machine
main_flow: L’admin accede alla pagina di creazione.
Il sistema salva la vending machine nel database.
alternative_flows: Errore nel salvataggio: messaggio e richiesta di riprovare.

use_case.name: Use Case Structure
main_flow: ID: Identificativo univoco del caso d’uso.
Nome: Titolo descrittivo del caso d’uso.
Livello: Classificazione del caso d’uso (es. Function Goal
Pre-condizioni: Condizioni che devono essere vere prima dell’avvio del flusso.
Post-condizioni: Risultato atteso alla fine del flusso.
Flusso Principale: Sequenza di passi standard che descrivono il comportamento del sistema.
Flusso Alternativo: Eventuali deviazioni dal flusso principale

use_case.name: Track Active Connections
main_flow: Track active connections between users and machines

use_case.name: Remote Maintenance Feature
main_flow: Enable remote management features such as unlocking a stuck product

components.name: JavaBrew Software
components.responsibility: Gestisce una rete di distributori automatici connessi
components.design_notes: Responsibility seems too broad, potentially violating separation of concerns.

components.name: Applicazione mobile
components.responsibility: Permette l'acquisto di articoli tramite codice QR
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility.

components.name: Wallet digitale
components.responsibility: Associato all’account personale per le transazioni
components.design_notes: Responsibility is defined but could use more detail on interaction specifics.

components.name: Dashboard
components.responsibility: Mostra statistiche e consente monitoraggio delle vendite e malfunzionamenti
components.design_notes: This component supports multi-user roles but lacks detail on data relationships with others.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architecture aims to create a modern and user-friendly management system for vending machines. However, the components and their interactions lack clear definition, leading to potential weaknesses in understanding data flow and responsibilities.

components.name: PostgreSQL 16
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility as a production database.

components.name: H2 Database
components.responsibility: Utilizzato per i test automatici. Il database è in-memory e consente test rapidi.
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility for testing purposes.

components.name: Jakarta Persistence API (JPA) 3.2.0
components.responsibility: Standard per la gestione della persistenza tramite ORM.
components.design_notes: Responsibility seems too broad, potentially violating separation of concerns.

components.name: Hibernate ORM 6.5.2.Final
components.responsibility: Implementazione di JPA utilizzata per ORM. Permette la generazione automatica dello schema a partire dal modello a oggetti (hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto).
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility concerning ORM implementation.

components.name: Jakarta Transaction API 2.0.1
components.responsibility: Utilizzata per la gestione delle transazioni distribuite.
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility for transaction management.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architecture utilizes a mix of technologies for database management and ORM, but lacks clear communication or specific architectural pattern indication. Components are defined, but roles might benefit from clearer delineation.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architecture exhibits a layered structure with clear component roles and interactions. However, some responsibilities are vague, indicating potential areas for improvement in clarity. The separation of concerns is generally respected, but the interaction details could be elaborated further for better understanding.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architecture appears to follow principles of Domain-Driven Design, emphasizing encapsulation and modularity. However, it lacks clear description of communication paths between some components, which may hinder understanding of system interactions.

components.name: Data Access Object (DAO) Layer
components.responsibility: Abstracts and manages all data persistence operations of the application.
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility to handle data persistence requirements.

components.name: DBManager
components.responsibility: Centralizes database interaction and manages connection details.
components.design_notes: This component effectively follows the Singleton pattern, ensuring a single point of access, which promotes loose coupling.

components.name: TaskDao
components.responsibility: Defines contracts for CRUD operations related to Task entities.
components.design_notes: Responsibility is well-defined for task-related operations with specific method signatures.

components.name: UserDao
components.responsibility: Defines contracts for CRUD operations related to User entities.
components.design_notes: Responsibility is clear, encompassing user management functionality.

components.name: VendingMachineDao
components.responsibility: Defines contracts for retrieving VendingMachine data.
components.design_notes: Specific responsibility related to vending machine data retrieval is clear.

components.name: TransactionDao
components.design_notes: Responsibility is explicitly defined but could include more detailed operation descriptions.

components.name: MaintenanceDao
components.responsibility: Defines contracts for handling maintenance reports.
components.design_notes: Responsibility is appropriate and clearly defined.

components.name: ConnectionDao
components.design_notes: Responsibility is defined but may benefit from more detail on connection management processes.

components.name: InventoryDao
components.design_notes: Responsibility is well-defined and has clear method functionalities.

components.name: ItemDao
components.design_notes: Responsibility is clear and explicitly defined for item management.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architecture effectively implements the Data Access Object (DAO) pattern, demonstrating a clear separation of concerns between business logic and data persistence. However, the use of vague terms in some responsibilities could benefit from further clarification. The design is generally well-structured but may lack comprehensive descriptions of certain component interactions.

components.name: UserController
components.responsibility: +login(email: String, password: String): User, +signUp(user: User): User
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility related to user actions.

components.name: CustomerController
components.responsibility: +connect(machineId: long): connection, +getInventory(machineId: long): List<Item>, +buyItem(connectionId: long, itemId: long): void, +rechargeBalance(double amount): void, +disconnect(connection: Connection): void
components.design_notes: This component has a responsible set of functions that are user-related, although the sheer number of functions may indicate potential broad responsibilities.

components.name: WorkerController
components.design_notes: This component serves the worker tasks with a clear purpose.

components.name: AdminController
components.design_notes: Responsibility seems too broad, potentially violating separation of concerns due to multiple CRUD related methods.

components.name: MachineController
components.responsibility: +deployItem(machineId: long, item: Item): void, +getStatus(machineId: long): MachineStatus, +runDiagnostic(machineId: long): maintenanceReport
components.design_notes: This component has distinct responsibilities related to machine operations.

components.name: UserService
components.responsibility: +login(email, password): User, +signUp(email, name, surname, password): User, +logOut(userId: long): void
components.design_notes: This component effectively handles user-related services with clarity in purpose.

components.name: CustomerService
components.responsibility: +connect(customerId: long, machineId: long): Connection, +getInventory(Connection): List<Item>, +checkBalance(customerId: long, amount: double): double, +buyItem(Connection: Connection, itemId: long): void, +updateBalance(customerId: long, amount: double), +getTransactionHistory(customerId: long): List<Transaction>, +disconnect(): void
components.design_notes: This component manages customer service functionalities with clear responsibilities but may exhibit too broad a scope.

components.name: WorkerService
components.design_notes: This is well-defined in scope focusing exclusively on worker tasks.

components.name: TaskService
components.design_notes: Simple and clear responsibility focused on task details retrieval.

components.name: InventoryService
components.design_notes: Defined responsibilities for inventory operations; well-structured.

components.name: TransactionService
components.design_notes: Clear responsibilities around handling transactions, facilitating an essential business process.

components.name: MachineService
components.responsibility: +deployItem(machineId: long, itemId: String), +reportIssue(report: MaintenanceReport), +runSelfDiagnostic(machineId: long), +getStatus(machineId: long)
components.design_notes: This component focuses on achieving clear tasks concerning machines and diagnostics.

components.name: AdminService
components.design_notes: Potentially too broad in scope with multiple responsibilities.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architecture displays a clear separation between Controllers and Services, adhering to the principles of modular design. However, there are some components that could benefit from better-defined responsibilities. Additionally, some communication paths are implied but not explicitly detailed, potentially leading to misunderstandings regarding interaction.

components.name: PostgreSQL
components.design_notes: This component has a clear responsibility as the primary production database.

components.name: H2 Database
components.responsibility: Utilizzato per i test automatici. Il database è in-memory e consente test rapidi.
components.design_notes: This component serves a specific purpose for testing, but its integration with other components is not detailed.

components.name: Jakarta Persistence API (JPA)
components.responsibility: Standard per la gestione della persistenza tramite ORM.
components.design_notes: Defines the standard for persistence management, but lacks detail on actual implementation usage.

components.name: Hibernate ORM
components.responsibility: Implementazione di JPA utilizzata per ORM. Permette la generazione automatica dello schema a partire dal modello a oggetti.
components.design_notes: Responsible for ORM, but its interaction specifics with other components are not fully explained.

components.name: Jakarta Transaction API
components.responsibility: Utilizzata per la gestione delle transazioni distribuite.
components.design_notes: Clear responsibility for managing distributed transactions. However, interaction with other components needs clarification.

components.name: Docker
components.responsibility: Utilizzato per containerizzare l’applicazione, il database PostgreSQL.
components.design_notes: Supports deployment strategy but lacks details on specific container interactions or configurations.

components.name: Docker Compose
components.responsibility: Utilizzato per definire e avviare l’intera architettura multi-container.
components.design_notes: Defines multi-container architecture but lacks specifics on individual component interactions.

components.name: JUnit
components.responsibility: Framework per l’esecuzione dei test unitari.
components.design_notes: Has a clear function for testing but doesn't specify communication with other components.

components.name: Mockito
components.responsibility: Utilizzato per la simulazione di dipendenze durante i test (mocking).
components.design_notes: Defines its role in unit testing effectively, but no inter-component communication is described.

components.name: Jacoco
components.responsibility: Strumento per la generazione dei report di copertura del codice.
components.design_notes: Clear responsibility for code coverage reporting without interactions specified.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architecture uses several well-defined components, including a relational database and a containerization strategy. However, it lacks clarity on specific architectural patterns being employed. Additionally, details on component interactions are minimal, which hinders a complete understanding of the overall architecture.

components.name: app_user
components.responsibility: Stores common information for all users (username, password, email, role).
components.design_notes: This component has a clear responsibility of centralizing common user data, promoting separation of concerns.

components.name: admin
components.responsibility: Extends app_user with specific attributes for admin users.
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility focused on admin-specific data.

components.name: worker
components.responsibility: Extends app_user with specific attributes for worker users.
components.design_notes: This component is well-defined but vague on the specific attributes it handles.

components.name: customer
components.responsibility: Extends app_user with specific attributes for customer users.
components.design_notes: This component is well-defined but vague on the specific attributes it handles.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architecture seems to follow a role-based access control pattern with distinct user roles, but lacks clarity on overall architectural style. Strengths include separation of common user attributes and responsibility assignment, but there are ambiguities in the interaction between user roles and lack of elaboration on communication paths.

components.name: vendingmachine
components.responsibility: Definisce i modelli generici (es. modelnumber, type)
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility.

components.name: concretevendingmachine
components.responsibility: Rappresenta un’istanza fisica (es. serialnumber, location, status, capacity)
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility.

components.name: inventory
components.responsibility: Traccia lo spazio occupato (occupiedspace) e collega gli articoli
components.design_notes: Responsibility seems too broad, potentially violating separation of concerns.

components.name: item
components.responsibility: Elenca i prodotti disponibili (es. name, price, quantity, position)
components.design_notes: This component has a clear, single responsibility.

architecture.analysis_summary: The architectural description includes key components like vending machines, inventories, and items, but lacks clarity on the overarching architectural pattern. Responsibilities are defined for each component, though some could benefit from further detail. Communication paths between components are not explicitly elaborated, leaving gaps in understanding their interactions.
